rules.name: carefulBreak
rules.description: Places the mined block in the player inventory when sneaking

rules.name: donkeyDupeFeature
rules.description: Enables old donkey / llama dupe bug.

rules.name: keepEnderPearlsTicked
rules.description: Projectiles are ticked the whole time - Projectile loading chunks

rules.name: oldFlintAndSteelBehavior
rules.description: Backports 1.12 flint and steel behavior. Flint and steel can be used for updating observers / buds

rules.name: projectileRaycastLength
rules.description: Changes the distance projectiles check for collisions. If set to 0 all Blocks to the destination will be checked which is the Vanilla behaviour.
extras: This reduces lag for fast projectiles. In 1.12 the value was 200.

rules.name: stackingSplashPotions
rules.description: Combines the duration of splash potions
